string-array.name: jokes
string-array.item:
Why you shouldn't write with a broken pencil?



… because it's pointless

What happens when a frog's car breaks?



… it gets toad

What do you get when you put a vest on an alligator?



… an investigator

Why was the stadium so cool?



… it was filled with fans

Did you hear about the two antennas that got married?



… the ceremony was okay, but, the reception was great!

Why was the cheetah so bad at hide and seek?



… no matter where she hid, she was always spotted

What does a nosy pepper do?



… it gets jalapeno business

Why does a duck have tail feathers?



… to cover its butt-quack

What did the teacher do with her students' report on the history of cheese?



… she grated it

What do cats eat for breakfast?



… mice-krispies

Why didn't the melons get married?



… because they can't elope

What do clouds wear under their shorts?



… thunder-pants
